title: SideDrawerSection
description: This is an aggegation of navigation pages in side drawer.

Caption.description: A caption label for the section

Visible.description: A flag to determine if the section is visible

PreserveImageSpacing.description: A flag to determine if the space for image in the items will be preserved when there is no image.

SeparatorEnabled.description: A flag to determine if the separator at the end of the section will be displayed.

Items.description: List of navigation items in the section. The list can be defined directly as an array or from a rule which returns the array.

Styles.description: Override the styles for the section.

SectionCaption.description: Use this to style the text view of section caption.

SectionSeparator.description: Use this to style the separators dividing sections. Can also remove by setting border-bottom-width to 0.

SectionItemActive.description:
Use this to style menu item which is currently selected.

This style can be overridden at item level.

SectionItemOnPress.description:
Use this to style menu item when it is touched upon.

This style can be overridden at item level.

SectionItemInactive.description:
Use this to style all the menu items that are not selected.

This style can be overridden at item level.
